name: Albuterol

general: For Pedi and Adult can add Ipratropium 0.5mg for a DuoNeb based on patient severity
pedi: Asthma - 1.25-2.5mg Albuterol {Nebulizer} repeat as needed x3 [AR7]
Allergic Reaction - 2.5-5mg Albuterol {Nebulizer} repeat as needed x3 [PM1]
adult: Asthma & Allergic Reaction - 2.5-5mg Albuterol {Nebulizer} repeat as needed x3 [AM1] [AR4]

pearls: [AR4] Patients may require more than 3 nebulizer treatments, treatments should continue until improvement. Following 3 combination nebulizers (DuoNeb), it is preferable to continue albuterol solely with subsequent treatments as there is no proven benefit to continual use of ipratropium.

[PC3] Be aware of CHF - Do not assume all wheezing is pulmonary, especially in a cardiac child: avoid albuterol unless strong history of recurrent wheezing secondary to pulmonary etiology (discuss with Medical Control)
